description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Unstoppable Chopper is out of control and he is going to crash, that is unless you can guide him past all other air traffic out there. Collect coins on the way to increase your score. With 24 levels to get through Unstoppable Chopper is a great game for the whole family. Includes online highscore tables and friends highscores.
